sense.def:
To soak something
pomeni dati nekaj v tekočino in pustiti v njej.

seg.quote: Soak the material for several hours in cold water.
‘Can I help you with the dishes?’—‘Oh, I'll just leave them to soak.’

sense.def:
Kadar tekočina
soaks something
, nekaj naredi mokro.

seg.quote: A stream of water came in and soaked both sleeping bags.

sense.def:
Kadar tekočina
soaks through something
, prodre skozi nekaj.

seg.quote: The blood had soaked through the handkerchief.

sense.def:
Kadar mehka ali suha snov
soaks up a liquid
, sprejme vase tekočino.

seg.quote: The soil soaked up a huge volume of water.
